TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NotifyIcon extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public NotInheritable Class NotifyIcon Inherits Component
public ref class NotifyIcon sealed : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 指定在通知區域中建立圖示的元件。

span.span: Specifies a component that creates an icon in the notification area.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通知區域中的圖示是電腦的捷徑，例如防毒程式或音量控制背景中執行的處理序。Icons in the notification area are shortcuts to processes that are running in the background of a computer, such as a virus protection program or a volume control. 這些程序並未隨附自己的使用者介面。These processes do not come with their own user interfaces. 類別提供用來在程式中這項功能。The class provides a way to program in this functionality. 屬性會定義會出現在通知區域圖示。The property defines the icon that appears in the notification area. 圖示的快顯功能表而獲得解決屬性。Pop-up menus for an icon are addressed with the property. 屬性指派的工具提示文字。The property assigns ToolTip text. 為了讓圖示以顯示在通知區域中，屬性必須設為`true`。In order for the icon to show up in the notification area, the property must be set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以顯示在通知區域中的應用程式的圖示。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ，以及屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A具有**結束**上面的項目指派給屬性，可讓使用者關閉應用程式。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 當事件發生時，藉由呼叫啟動應用程式表單方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: to create the component.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當新建立時，屬性設定為`false`。When a new is created, the property is set to `false`. 您必須設定屬性，以`true`若要使用您所建立。You must set the property to `true` in order to use the you created. 這個執行個體將會存在，直到它的容器釋放記憶體回收。This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.

summary.span: 使用指定的容器 (Container) 來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當新建立時，屬性設定為`false`。When a new is created, the property is set to `false`. 您必須設定屬性，以`true`若要使用您所建立。You must set the property to `true` in order to use the you created. 這個執行個體將會存在，直到它的容器釋放記憶體回收。This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以顯示在通知區域中的應用程式的圖示。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ，以及屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A具有**結束**上面的項目指派給屬性，可讓使用者關閉應用程式。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 當事件發生時，藉由呼叫啟動應用程式表單方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BalloonTipClicked As EventHandler

summary.span: 當按一下氣球提示時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the balloon tip is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`NotifyIcon1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NotifyIcon1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#505](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#505)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#505](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#505)]

summary.span: 取得或設定圖示的捷徑功能表。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the icon.
The for the icon.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下工作列的通知區域中的圖示時，就會顯示功能表。The menu is shown when the user right-clicks an icon in the notification area of the taskbar. 快顯功能表也稱為快顯功能表。Shortcut menus also are known as pop-up menus. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以顯示在通知區域中的應用程式的圖示。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ，以及屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A具有**結束**上面的項目指派給屬性，可讓使用者關閉應用程式。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 當事件發生時，藉由呼叫啟動應用程式表單方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`NotifyIcon1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NotifyIcon1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 在工作列中顯示氣球提示。

span.span: Displays the balloon tip in the taskbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ShowBalloonTip(int32 timeout) cil managed

param.name: timeout
param.span: 氣球提示應該顯示的時段 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The time period, in milliseconds, the balloon tip should display.

block.para: 從 Windows Vista 開始，這個參數已被取代。通知顯示時間現在會根據系統協助工具設定。
This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista. Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.

summary.span: 在指定時段內，於工作列中顯示氣球提示。

span.span: Displays a balloon tip in the taskbar for the specified time period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大逾時值強制執行的作業系統，並且通常為 10 和 30 秒，分別，不過這會視作業系統而有所不同。Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system. 逾時值太大或太小會調整為適當的最小值或最大值。Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value. 此外，如果使用者不會使用電腦 （沒有鍵盤或滑鼠事件會發生） 然後系統不會計算這次為逾。In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout. 只有一個氣球提示可以顯示在工作列上，一次。Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time. 嘗試將其中一個目前顯示在工作列原因時顯示氣球提示`timeout`来忽略的值。Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored. 行為會稍有不同，取決於作業系統和氣球提示是否來自另一個，或相同的應用程式。The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application. 值為何，第二個出現之前從另一個應用程式的第二個的汽球提示時，將第一個的汽球提示會顯示最小逾時值的`timeout`。When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`. 在大部分情況下，如果球形文字說明提示是從相同的應用程式，第一個提示氣球提示立即關閉當另一個呼叫至方法。In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the method is made. 在某些情況下第二個的球形文字說明會在第一次的球形文字說明之上開啟。In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon. 標題文字會靠近頂端的球形文字說明以粗體字顯示。The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將範例程式碼貼到 Windows 表單，其中包含名為`notifyIcon1`。To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a named `notifyIcon1`. 呼叫`SetBalloonTip`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。Call `SetBalloonTip` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: is less than 0.

block.para: 從 Windows Vista 開始，這個參數已被取代。通知顯示時間現在會根據系統協助工具設定。
This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista. Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.

One of the values.

summary.span: 在指定時段內，於工作列中顯示具有指定標題、文字和圖示的氣球提示。

span.span: Displays a balloon tip with the specified title, text, and icon in the taskbar for the specified time period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大逾時值強制執行的作業系統，並且通常為 10 和 30 秒，分別，不過這會視作業系統而有所不同。Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system. 逾時值太大或太小會調整為適當的最小值或最大值。Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value. 此外，如果使用者不會使用電腦 （沒有鍵盤或滑鼠事件會發生） 然後系統不會計算這次為逾。In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout. 只有一個氣球提示可以顯示在工作列上，一次。Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time. 嘗試將其中一個目前顯示在工作列原因時顯示氣球提示`timeout`来忽略的值。Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored. 行為會稍有不同，取決於作業系統和氣球提示是否來自另一個，或相同的應用程式。The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application. 值為何，第二個出現之前從另一個應用程式的第二個的汽球提示時，將第一個的汽球提示會顯示最小逾時值的`timeout`。When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`. 在大部分情況下，如果球形文字說明提示是從相同的應用程式，第一個提示氣球提示立即關閉當另一個呼叫至方法。In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the method is made. 在某些情況下第二個的球形文字說明會在第一次的球形文字說明之上開啟。In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon. 標題文字會靠近頂端的球形文字說明以粗體字顯示。The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將範例程式碼貼到 Windows 表單，其中包含名為`notifyIcon1`。To run this example, paste the example code into a Windows Form that contains a named `notifyIcon1`. 建立關聯`Form1_DoubleClick`方法，在此範例中的表單事件。Associate the `Form1_DoubleClick` method in this example with the form's event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIconBalloonTip/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定工具提示文字，當滑鼠指標停留在通知區域圖示上時顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.

value.span: 工具提示文字，當滑鼠指標停留在通知區域圖示上時顯示。

span.span: The ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文字為`null`，會顯示任何工具提示。If the text is `null`, no ToolTip is displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以顯示在通知區域中的應用程式的圖示。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ，以及屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A具有**結束**上面的項目指派給屬性，可讓使用者關閉應用程式。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 當事件發生時，藉由呼叫啟動應用程式表單方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: ToolTip text is more than 63 characters long.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在工作列的通知區域中顯示圖示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the icon is visible in the notification area of the taskbar.

value.span: 如果可在告知區域中看見圖示，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the icon is visible in the notification area; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為預設值是`false`，才會出現在通知區域圖示，您必須設定屬性設`true`。Since the default value is `false`, in order for the icon to show up in the notification area, you must set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以顯示在通知區域中的應用程式的圖示。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display an icon for an application in the notification area. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ，以及屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. A具有**結束**上面的項目指派給屬性，可讓使用者關閉應用程式。A with an **Exit** item on it is assigned to the property, which allows the user to close the application. 當事件發生時，藉由呼叫啟動應用程式表單方法。When the event occurs, the application form is activated by calling the method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon/VB/source.vb#1)]
